sentences.en: A roaring sound like the breaking of surf rose from the crowd.
sentences.cn: 人群中一片震天的喧嚷像怒涛般滚滚而来.

sentences.en: Below, noisy swells were breaking on the hull like surf.
sentences.cn: 下面, 哗哗的激浪拍打着舰体,象拍岸的浪花.

sentences.en: Come and surf in the ocean in front of the hotel.
sentences.cn: 在旅馆前的大海里尽情的冲浪吧.

sentences.en: Holidaymakers continued to pour down to the coast in search of surf and sun.
sentences.cn: 度假者不断涌至海边冲浪和享受阳光。

sentences.en: I surf every day from about 8 P . M. to midnight.
sentences.cn: 我每天都冲浪,从早上八点到午夜.

sentences.en: I surf the Internet two hours a day.
sentences.cn: 我每天上网冲浪两个小时.

sentences.en: I'm going to buy a surfboard and learn to surf.
sentences.cn: 我要去买个冲浪板来学冲浪。

sentences.en: If we have to run a surf you'll need all your strength.
sentences.cn: 如果必须对付拍岸浪的话,你们得把全部力气都用上.

sentences.en: No one knows how many people currently surf the Net.
sentences.cn: 没人知道现在有多少人在网上冲浪。

sentences.en: Surf action on coastal areas has produced other quantities.
sentences.cn: 拍岸浪对海岸地区的作用产生了另一些数量的物质.

sentences.en: the sound of surf breaking on the beach
They threw off their clothes and ran into the surf.
sentences.cn: 他们脱掉衣服奔向海浪.

sentences.en: Walking in the surf, she had to roll her pants up to her knees.
sentences.cn: 她走在海浪里，不得不把裤腿卷到膝盖处。

sentences.en: You can't surf at night. I always go surfing in the morning.
sentences.cn: 你不能在晚上冲浪. 我总是在早上去冲浪.

sentences.en: Young writers , surf - riders upon nowness, sometimes glitter with talent.
sentences.cn: 在现在瞬间中随潮起伏的青年作家, 有时确实闪耀着才华.

words.tran_cn: 冲浪运动员，乘冲浪板冲浪的人

phrases.tran_cn: 上网；上网冲浪；网上冲浪；浏览因特网

trans.tran_en: the white substance that forms on top of waves as they move towards the shore
to ride on waves while standing on a special board
